sqlMap.select:
SELECT USER_ID ,OPENID ,NICKNAME ,SUBSCRIBE ,SEX ,LANGUAGE ,CITY ,PROVINCE ,COUNTRY ,HEADIMGURL ,SUBSCRIBE_TIME ,UNIONID ,REMARK ,ADDRESS ,MOBILE FROM T_ACT_USERS WHERE 1=1 AND T_ACT_USERS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(USER_ID) Like '%'||(#user_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(OPENID) Like '%'||(#openid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NICKNAME) Like '%'||(#nickname:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUBSCRIBE) Like '%'||(#subscribe:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SEX) Like '%'||(#sex:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LANGUAGE) Like '%'||(#language:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CITY) Like '%'||(#city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROVINCE) Like '%'||(#province:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNTRY) Like '%'||(#country:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(HEADIMGURL) Like '%'||(#headimgurl:VARCHAR#)||'%'
TO_CHAR(SUBSCRIBE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd') =TO_CHAR((#subscribe_time:DATE#),'yyyy-MM-dd')
(UNIONID) Like '%'||(#unionid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ADDRESS) Like '%'||(#address:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MOBILE) Like '%'||(#mobile:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM T_ACT_USERS WHERE 1=1 AND T_ACT_USERS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(USER_ID) Like '%'||(#user_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(OPENID) Like '%'||(#openid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(NICKNAME) Like '%'||(#nickname:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SUBSCRIBE) Like '%'||(#subscribe:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(SEX) Like '%'||(#sex:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(LANGUAGE) Like '%'||(#language:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CITY) Like '%'||(#city:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(PROVINCE) Like '%'||(#province:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(COUNTRY) Like '%'||(#country:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(HEADIMGURL) Like '%'||(#headimgurl:VARCHAR#)||'%'
TO_CHAR(SUBSCRIBE_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd')=TO_CHAR((#subscribe_time:DATE#),'yyyy-MM-dd')
(UNIONID) Like '%'||(#unionid:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(REMARK) Like '%'||(#remark:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ADDRESS) Like '%'||(#address:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MOBILE) Like '%'||(#mobile:VARCHAR#)||'%'
